title: Implement Real-time Collaboration Features
description: Add WebSocket support for real-time document editing, cursor tracking, and live presence indicators. Enable multiple users to work on the same document simultaneously with conflict resolution.

title: Optimize Database Query Performance
description: Analyze and optimize slow database queries. Add proper indexing, implement query caching, and refactor N+1 queries. Target 50% reduction in average query time.

title: Build AI-Powered Search
description: Implement semantic search using vector embeddings. Integrate with OpenAI/Claude for natural language queries. Add filters, sorting, and relevance ranking.

title: Mobile App Development - iOS & Android
description: Build native mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms using React Native. Implement offline-first architecture with local data sync.

title: Implement CI/CD Pipeline
description: Set up automated testing, linting, and deployment pipeline using GitHub Actions. Include staging and production environments with automatic rollback capabilities.

title: Add Payment Integration with Stripe
description: Integrate Stripe for subscription payments, one-time purchases, and usage-based billing. Implement webhook handlers for payment events and invoice generation.

subtasks.title: Research and planning for Build auth
subtasks.description: Conduct initial research and create detailed plan for implementing Build auth. Identify requirements and potential challenges.

subtasks.description: Implement the main functionality described in: nanksandsa
